Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that "Star Wars" movies will be filmed in several small, off-the-beaten-path towns across America.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the rumors about the filming locations of the "Star Wars" movies are accurate, which may not be the case.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim may have alternative explanations, such as the spread of fake news or the use of clickbait tactics to generate ad revenue.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the statement from Liz Gilman, executive producer of Produce Iowa, who states that the rumors about Davenport, Iowa being a filming location for the next "Star Wars" movie are not correct.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the rumors by stating that the movies will be filmed in "several" small towns across America, without concrete evidence to support this.
